test.name: TC 1: User searches for the relevant products and validates the product titles and price is displayed

kw.name: User navigates to initiate the browser session
User navigates to the homepage in the browser
Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Firefox WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Browser Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Given user validates the title of the page
Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: When User validates the list of all the products in the product list page as per the expectation
